en.main:
Images you can use in descriptions
<arc/> <void/> <solar/>
<primary/> <special/> <heavy/>
<warlock/> <hunter/> <titan/>
Text coloring
<blue text /> <green text /> <purple text /> <yellow text />
<pvp text /> <pve text />

The same can be done to lines of text <green/>

You probably noticed having multiple spaces in the editor
              doesn't mean it will be the same in description
              you can change that with <breakSpaces/>

// This is comment content after // will not appear in the description

// ----------------------------------------------------------
// weapon type explanation
// they work like if else in programming

// if auto rifle
< weapon type ( AR ) >
    Apply this text
// else if glaive
< ( Glaive ) >
    Apply this text
// else
< ( other ) >
    Apply this text to all weapons not specified in this block
<$$>
// also, you can preview how it would look on x weapon by selecting the weapon in the weapon popup under the weapons name
// ----------------------------------------------------------
If there is something you want just ask
This is not everything you can do btw

To see the full list press CTRL + SPACE
Also, CTRL + F is a thing and can be used to find and replace
Also also editor has other stuff to see them press F1

zh-chs.main:
// this variale only shows up on enhanced perks
var e = 🠅

var refill = 重新装填，但没有装填动画，也不触发换弹相关特性。

var rof = <title 射速 [G_rof] />

en.main:
Upon finishing a reload within 7 seconds of a Weapon Kill:
Increases Magazine Capacity based on the amount of kills within 7 seconds of each.

Maxes out at 150% increased Magazine Capacity. Always rounds magazine up.

<primary/> Primary Weapons: 20% Increased Magazine Capacity per Kill.
<special/> Special and <heavy/> Power Weapons: 10%.

enhanced (
#e Passively grants +5 Reload Speed. Timer between kills is increased to 8 seconds.
)

zh-chs.main:
该武器击杀后 7 秒内换弹：
7 秒内的每个击杀都可过量填加弹匣， 

最高过量填加 50%，计算结果向上取整。

<primary/> 主武器：每个击杀过量填加 20%。
<special/> 特殊武器和 <heavy/> 重武器：每个击杀过量填加 10%。

enhanced (
#e +5 换弹速度
)

es.main:
Luego de recargar despues de  [?] segundos despues de una Baja con el arma:
Aumenta la capacidad del Cargador por baja dentro de [?] segundos

Puede llegar a ser un 150% la cantidad del cargador original. Redondea hacia arriba. 

Armas Primarias reciben un 20% a la capacidad aumentada por baja. Armas Especiales y Pesadas reciben un 10%

Aumentado: Otorga +5 a la velocidad de recarga de forma pasiva
